iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: amalhupishiza, itiza sa fuifuilh patashan a shinshii munai, lhupilhupishan a shanautuan mzai, “ilhilhi! pashungkitaz!”
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”
我今天七點到學校。: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: matunaw malhinuna iamin zain, “shinshii maqitan uhu.”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: pinfazaq iamin shinshii tata tusha turu lhupishan a Thau a lalawa ya lhmupish patashan.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: muntal iamin fuifuilh patashan a shinshii malhinuna, maqaquyash iamin tata, tusha, turu lhupishan a quyash.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mafazaqiza iaku manasha wa Thau a lalawa.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: tatata wa qali malhupish iaku, numa tatata wa qali minfazaq iaku sa Thau a lalawa, afuilh iaku naak a ina tunmaza.
I go to school every day, I learn the Thau language every day, and I want to tell my mother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a lhanaz zain Ilash.
My name is Ilash.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的名字是Ilash。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a ama wa lhanaz zain Umin.
My dad’s name is Umin.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a ina wa lhanaz zain Apin.
My mother’s name is Apin.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: iaku thuini a kawash makthin a qamishan.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: itia naak a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut latata, thithu a lhanaz zain Tuba, thithu thuini a kawash makthin tata wa qamishan.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: lhmupish iamin isa tataal a lhupilhupishan a taun.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: madaduu iaku numa naak a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut maqaquyash.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: madaduu iaku mrauz, ya pangqaiza wa qali, iamin tata wa taun musuun amutusi mrauz.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw iaku mushnaw faqlhu a huruy, shduu iamin musuun maqaquyash numa mrauz.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: iamin tata wa taun larima wa thau.
There are five people in our family.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: itia iamin tata wa taun laturu a minlhafut.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: miasuun iaku naak a ama, ina, tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut numa tantuqash binanau’az a minlhafut.
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw marutaw naak a ama, numa maranash naak a ama.
My father is tall and he is a policeman.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw mashiqarman naak a ina, numa riqariqaz shiz a shinshii naak a ina.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a ama itaun mashthauthau mat itan ya malhinuna.

我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: iamin amakunakataunan ya pinangqaiza mahnariza wa qali.

我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: amusuun iamin smapuk sa bakbaki iaku numa naak a tantuqash a minlhafut.

我今天七點到學校。: 我和我的兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw iaku mushnaw tata taun a thau.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: iaku thuini masa naak a ina mutusi kilhnaqualh.

我今天七點到學校。: 今天我和我的媽媽出去玩。

我今天七點到學校。: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: iamin milhungqu ipruq kmaan sa paang, patilhazin naam a buut, mathuaw maqalhuuz.
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: saqaziza, qali mingqulhaiza.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: makikalhi iaku naak a ina, minu sa qali maqulhaqulha.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ina mzai, amashiraus painan.

我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說，可能是要颱風了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: tanlhuaniza wa qali uka s urum, mu’apawiza sa kilhpuz.

我今天七點到學校。: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: amushaiza ita mutaun mani.

我今天七點到學校。: 我們也要回家了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: amutauniza isa saran, fuilh iaku sa kilhpuz mzai.
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mihala s qali ingqawan shmiraus, amuqthawan iaku mani musha malhalhiqash.
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.
我今天七點到學校。: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a lhupilhupishan a taun isai naam a taun a shirshir, tatata wa qali iaku mundadaan ya mutusi lhupilhupishan a taun, numa mundadaan iaku mani makunataun.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mashtay azazak mususuun isa lhupilhupishan a makakakri a danshiqan, mususuun matinhina sa maqarimusuz, numa musuun malhinuna.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: fuifuilh patashan a shinshii musuun iamin mani malhalhiqash, lhupilhupishan a taun miazai sa mara’in a taun.

我今天七點到學校。: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: tatata wa qali iamin thmapu sa bukhaz, mashtay thmapu taun numa piatilaw.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: numa suma wa thau tmitish paziwat numa suma thmapu sa bukhaz.
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.
我今天七點到學校。: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mashtay iamin thmapu lhupilhupishan a taun a pruq, pashtay mindahip thmapu lhupilhupishan a taun, numa tatata wa qali matilatilaw sa lhupilhupishan a taun.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: shitusi iaku tilha mriqaz naak a apura’in.
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw mindaaq iaku antu minriqaz naak a apura’in, mathuaw iaku mangqtuqtu thithu.

我今天七點到學校。: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a apura’in tu mriqaz iakin, pakaan iakin sharitunu numa piaqilha iakin pushawil.
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to papaya and drink tea.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a apura’in pinalhuiza wa sharitunu mathuaw madahun, dadu mathuaw tauduu ya kaanin.

我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺種的木瓜很甜，真的很好吃。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw iaku miku iqilha naak a apura’in a pushawil, mathuaw maqitan iqilhan.
I also like grandpa’s tea, it’s tasted good too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ya saqazi, miasuun iaku naak a apuki’ay pinsaqazi iamin pit’ia.
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.
我今天七點到學校。: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw naak a apuki’ay pinsaqazi pit’ia manasha pania’an, ianan rusaw, ianan ranaw, ianan bahat, numa ianan mani riaz.
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and clam.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有河蚌。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: kminaaniza kunsaqazi, musui tamakuan iamin mara shanglaw.
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw naak a apuki’ay lhai iakin buna, lhari numa tilkun, kathu mutaun.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: zaik thaithuy amushaiza iaku mutaun, ya ishawananiza iaku amuqthaiza iaku musui mriqaz thaithuy.

After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back
我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: shungkash iaku sa qlhuran, numawan ani iaku amariqaz qlhuran.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: iaku mriqaz rumfaz mathuaw manasha, thaithuy isui kawi mathuaw mafarfaz, mriqaz iaku mani shmadia malhus isai kawi a mabraq a itmaz.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ia’ianan numanuma wa lhkaribush a luluuman ianan sa thumay, tishmamraw numa rukzaw, ani iaku kahiwan mriqariqaz izai a lhkaribush, mathuaw iaku thuini maqaran tu mriqaz.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: pashtiruq iaku manasha sa pinashtiruq pariqaz naak a ama ina.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: amunai iaku musuun naak a ama ina ya kahiza.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: pangqaiza wa qali thuini, iaku masa naak a tantuqash binanau’az a minlhafut shitusi Tai-taang mriqaz naak a pan’amaan.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: shaunanaiza iamin Tai-taang, naak a pan’amaan patungbarimbin munai barimbin a pangqangqan mashduu iamin.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: barimbin a pangqangqan masa naak a pan’amaan a taun antu ihazish, ya patungbarimbin muhiaw shaunatantu.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a pan’amaan a taun a shirshir itia mathuaw mara’ira’in a mara’in a buqan, musuun ita kmangqtha sa kangqthaan a barimbin mutantu mara’in a buqan.

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: thuini iamin mutauniza iamin Tai-paak, tihauta iaku naak a pan’amaan a u-tu-bai qazii ya ungqtuaniza.

When we were young, our family lived in Baraubaw. After I started school, we moved to Taipei and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在日月村，上學以後，就搬到了台北，一直在都市裡生活。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: numa minalhupishiza sa mara’in a lhupilhupishan, lhminupish iaku minfazaq miniahala inai a thau a kazakazash a minfazaq a patashan, mafazaqiza iaku Tai-waan miniahala inai a thau a qbit itia manasha wa numanuma wa kazakazash.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: numawan, thuini a pinangqaiza mahnariza wa qali, makunakataunan iaku numa naak a tantuqash ayuzi a minlhafut numa makikalhi iamin tanatuqash, mangqtu iamin minfazaq sa naam a Thau a kazakazash.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: haya tuqatuqash makashpashpatiza wa qamishan, numa riqazan sundaiza parhawaywan.
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: makikalhi iaku thithu mafazaq thithu numanuma wa lalawa, mathuaw thithu malhinuna Thau a lalawa mathuaw ma’ania, mafazaq mani thithu mashbunun a lalawa, numa Shpuut a lalawa numa Lit-puun a lalawa.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Thau, as well as Bunun, Hokkien and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的邵語說得很流利，也會說布農語、閩南話和日本話。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: makikalhi iaku thithu, numa mafazaq iaku, maqa thithu minalhupish Lit-puun a lalawa tu azazakuan, tu Bunun a thau thithu a binanau’az, numa mathuaw thithu tu malhkakrikriw mathuaw kafazaqin thithu manasha Shpuut, numawan mafazaq thithu manasha antu tataal a lalawa.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Bunu, and he knows many Hokkien at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是布農族人，而他工作上認識許多閩南人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: musuun iamin malhalhinuna, numa izai tanatuqash fuilh manasha muribush a kazakazash.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: sharaqian antu shiruan iamin mafazaq sa mulhthkiz a lalawa, kanuniza pulaunin sa bahi iamin pasain sa ling-waa, shduu iamin muqtha tmaza.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: maura iaku mita wa Thau a kazakazash tu azazakuan, mayaw iaku mzai Thau mita.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mafazaqiza iaku thuini Thau a numanuma wa kazakazash, mangqtu iaku mathuaw maqaran numa maqitan tu Thau iaku.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Thau is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為邵族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: thuini a saqaziza, amutauniza shashuaz ayuzi a minlhafut.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mutusi iaku numa naak a apuki’ay farifariwan sa pania’an fariw sa ranaw, kuntanlhuan apintata iamin maqitan a akaanin pakaan naak a shashuaz ayuzi a minlhafut.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mun’iutu iamin farifariwan shanglaw a taun, farifariwan shanglaw a taun itia manasha wa maqitaqitan a shanglaw.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: finariw iamin sangriz, sipu numa maqulha wa sai-puu.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: isa shirshir farifariwan ribush a bunlhaz a taun a talima mzai, “mathuaw madahun naak a ung-lai numa qalup. fariwuan!”
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: finariw iamin ung-lai numa qalup.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mun’iutu iamin farifariwan bunlhaz a taun talima mzai, “numa sa afariwin uhu qa? mathuaw mara’in numa maramu thuini a ranaw, latata wa ranaw turu a shaba.”
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today’s chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a apuki’ay mzai mathuaw manasha tuali, zaiwan thithu talima putladadu sa tuali.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: kanuniza mzai s talima mathuaw ladadu a tuali, antu putladadu sa tuali.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: shirshir a talima mzai, “unaiwan fariw naak a rusaw, mathuaw mara’in numa ladadu a tuali naak a rusaw.”
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說:「來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mingqarayza finariw iamin ranaw numa finariw iamin mani rusaw, numa mutaun pintata numa tata wa pangka manasha pania’an.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mindaaq mitalha, minqusumiza sa qali.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: shashuaz ayuzi a minlhafut malhinuna sa ling-wa mzai, kanshitashan antu dai pangqa, amuqtha wa pangqaiza wa qali amutauniza.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn’t take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: numa apuki’ay mzai, “pania’an mathuaw manasha, palalawa pashtay munai musuun kmaan!”
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let’s eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: malalawa iamin piathauthaun numa huruy, munai musuun kuntanlhuan kmaan.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: itia naak a tata wa tataal lhmupish a huruy zain Rungquan, miaqay min’a’aura kmathu thithu a aniamin.
I have a classmate named Rungquan, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Rungquan，他常常忘記帶東西。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ya malhupish miaqay thithu mashimul tataal lhmupish a huruy patatash, tatitish numa patashan.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mutal, mupushaz, muturuz, mashtay pashimul thithu aniamin.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: numa maqa maqarman thithu minzawash miaqay mashimul antu pushuqish thithu.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mingqarayza mashtay antu pashimul thithu aniamin.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: tata wa qali, mashtay iamin musuun mutusi kilhnaqualh.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: makuntusi iamin isa saran, apishtupuan sa Rungquan, numa min’aura thithu kmathu sa qahil.
On the way, Rungquan wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Rungquan想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: amashimul thithu huruy qahil, zain thithu a huruy mzai, “ani iaku mani kminathu”
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說:「我也沒有帶耶。」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: numa izai Rungquan minsasalpu numa thmanit. minbuqnur thithu mzai, “minuiza pashtay maniun antu pashimul iakin qahil !”
Rungquan burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Rungquan急的哭了出來。他生氣的說:「為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙!」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: tataal lhmupish a huruy fuilh thithu, maqa miaqay ihu antu min’ananak makathu sa qahil, numa ihu ya shimimul numanuma antu pushuqish!
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: simaqiza malhupish iamin, Rungquan mathuaw matinhumhum mutusi lhupilhupishan a taun, thithu shmimul a numanuma pulhthkizin pushuqish lhai sa tataal lhmupish a huruy.
The next day at school, Rungquan arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Rungquan很早就到學校了，Rungquan把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: Rungquan mathuaw amazayza thithu a tataal lhmupish a huruy, numa fuilh thaithuy dai ya kahiza thithu amin’ananak kmathu numanuma aniamin, numa anuniza thaithuy sa tataal lhmupish a huruy pashimul thithu aniamin.
Rungquan apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Rungquan向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: kataunan a muribush a thau naak a ama.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: tu azazakuan iaku, naak a ama numa pan’amaan mutusi hudun ya tanlhuan, kmathu thaithuy sa funush numa puthuum.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔會在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ya shashanuiza, kmathu thaithuy mara sa matiqtu a lhkaribush makunataun.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ya tu suma wazish, ya tu suma rawaz, itia mani sa alhua masa lhizashan.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mapa’inqbit thaithuy lhkaribush a bunlhaz isai kataunan a pitaw, patara thaithuy suma wa thau.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: miaqay iaku miku untal naak a ama muribush.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a ama mzai ya mara’iniza amakathu iakin muntal muribush.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: kataunan a ayuzi mafazaq mani kmalawa sa tuqris, putuqris numa kmalawa qadup thaithuy ya muribush.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會放吊陷和設置石壓式陷阱。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw naak a ama ma’ania tmuqris, ama mzai, “haya wa tuqris apuqtu sa alhua, amariqaz iamin lhkaribush a sapaz, numa atmuqris iamin pisui sinaranan lhkaribush.”
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會設置吊陷，爸爸說:「這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，然後將吊陷放在獵物走過的路上。」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mangqtu iaku muhiaw muntal parhaway numa tanatuqash mutusi hudun muribush, numawan tatata wa qali minfazaq iaku kmalawa sa tuqris, amuhiaw naak a tuqris shduu mara sa lhkaribush.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: minriqaz naak a ama iakin mzai, “aminma’ania wa muribush a thau ihu ya kahiza.”
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說:「我以後一定會是很厲害的獵人。」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mara’iniza iaku thuini, mapa iaku naak a futulh numa lhpazishan muntal naak a ama iakin musui muribush.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mutaun iamin kataunan ya itia matiqtu sa lhkaribush patara pakaan suma wa thau.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ama mzai apaplish iamin, piakalingkin maniun mulhthkiz tanatuqash, mathuaw maqitan pimbahi iamin muribush mara manasha wa lhkaribush.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mutusi iaku malhupish shashanu saqazian.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mutusi iaku lhupilhupishan a taun, min’aura iaku kminathu sa antutuan patashan.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: numanuma wa aniamin antu kminathu iaku.
I didn’t bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ya lhmupish, iaku miasuun naak a tataal lhmupish a huruy mriqaz sa patashan.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ya mutazam, tataal lhmupish a huruy shimulik sa patatash numa tatitish.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: fuifuilh patashan a shinshii mzai, “milhhumhum ya muqthawan, niza tu saqazian!”
The teacher told me, \Wake up earlier next time and don’t be late again!\""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naak a maqitan a huruy mzai Huqu, Thau a azazak thithu mani.
My good friend’s name is Huqu, and he is also an Thau child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Huqu，他也是邵族的小孩。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: miasuun iamin isa Baraubaw a kataunan lhmupish.
We study together in the Baraubaw tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在Baraubaw部落讀書。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: miarain miasuun iamin tunmaza apu malhinuna kahiwan a lalawa, mathuaw ma’ania iamin ya malhinuna Thau a lalawa.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Thau proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說邵語。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mathuaw marutaw iaku mani maramu, mathuaw Huqu matumpiq mani mashiqarman.
I am tall and overweight, while Huqu is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Huqu很矮也很瘦。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: Huqu mathuaw ma’aluz’uz, pashtay madaduu thithu.
Huqu is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Huqu很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: lhupilhupishan a taun pinkazakaza sa buut a makakakri thuini, lhupilhupishan a taun kmalawa piza wa qbit malantatnur.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ianan sa shmuruz klhiw, psaq qarimusuz, malalia, minparaw, kmulhpazishan.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: malantatnur iaku malalia.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: malalia iaku taubukbuk, mathuaw qaruf paktalhum.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: kanuniza milhilhi iaku, muqthawan makunamuqtha malalia.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: shaunapispis iaku, pashtay a thau mathuaw ma’alah’a.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: sharaqian antu mara sa makintata, kanuniza mathuaw ma’alah’a iaku, maqa mukaktuniza iaku malantatnur.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: minuntal iaku naak a ama tilha mriqaz naak a pan’amaan.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: pan’amaan a kuskus siangiza
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mzai thithu iamin, taun a tafuq ianan latata wa tabraqan.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: kashiqitan thithu sa tafuq, initafuq panthathak panapruq.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: ama kminathu sa qnuan a bunlhaz masa shawiki lhai pan’amaan.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: iaku masa pan’amaan isa laqup malhalhinuna, mathuaw mzai thithu manasha sa kahiwan a lalawa patmazan iakin.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: amushaiza iaku, numa pan’amaan lhumfaan iakin mzai minrutawiza numa mindirudiruiza.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: zaik “pan’amaan a kuskus ya minqitaniza, muqthawan munai naak a taun kilhnaqualh.”
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34573/5: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: isa 2022 wa kawash, zing-huu pishfazaq miniahala inai a thau sa thau a tnuran shduuiza muqayza matash sa thau a qbit a lhanaz.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: iaku makikalhi sa mathuaw munsai zing-huu thmaduq mindaaq sa thau a tnuran muqayza matash sa thau a qbit a lhanaz kataunan a parhaway Panu.
I interviewed Panu, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Panu。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: amatilhduu iaku thithu inai pangqaiza wa qali mutusi thithu a taun makikalhi thithu.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: makikalhi thithu tu isisua, thithu pishfazaq iakin miakuza thithu a lhanaz minakanai, numa kmathu iakin mani mafazaq sa thithu a taun a thau, numa thithu a kataunan.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: makikalhi iaku thithu minu amingqtha sa lhanaz, sasaz a pinatash antu tauduu qa?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn’t the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: thithu muntazaikin mzai, maqa pasain Shpuut a matash antu pubalabalay pishfazaq thithu a lhanaz, suma wa thau amalalawa thithu mzai “Pa shinshii.” numawan kafazaan suma.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him \Ba Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: \" which resulted in many jokes being made."
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34573/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「巴先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: Panu mzai, “miniahala inai a thau matash a lhanaz shunda sa naam a lhanaz, naak a lhanaz mia’azu naam a thau a qbit, naam a taun a qbit, naam a tnuran, mangqtu ianan manasha sa thau a qbit apushuqish ananak a lhanaz.”
Panu said, \The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34573/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.\""
column5: Panu說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找回自己的名字。」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: tilha muntal iaku naak a apuki’ay musui farifariwan pashatalha sa aniamin, kathun apuki’ay manasha mat’anak malhuyza wa shanglaw mu’iutu, numa kmalawa miniahala inai a thau maqitan a akaanin lhai pashta.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: pashtay miku apuki’ay a pashatalha’an, makamun numa lhari manasha sa thau finariw, manasha sa thau munai kmaan pintatan thithu a pania’an.
Everyone loved my grandmother’s stall. Many people bought the chilis and taro, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和芋頭很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: thithu sa pintatan a tazakas numa sunda wa afu mathuaw maqitan ya kaanin, numa ianan pasain rafun masa rumrum puqana’an, shmurawath shazik manasha sa kilhnaqualh a thau, pashta mulhthkiz munai naam a pashatalha’an mududur.
The ferns and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的蕨菜和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多遊客，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: apuki’ay ya pintata sa aniamin, ishirshir iaku malalawa kilhnaqulh a thau. ishirshir minbabaw iaku mzai az’az mat’anak iamin malhuiza wa shanglaw, min’ananak maqitan, uhiawan munai fariw!
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, \The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!\""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/34573/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: naam a aniamin muhiaw fariwiniza, apuki’ay mzai, “maqa ianan ihu tu mindahip.”
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, \It’s all thanks to your help.\""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: izai a makakakri, mafazaq iaku sa izai miniahala inai a thau a pinalhuiza numa kakaanin a infazaqin, numa ananak shmuzap pashatalha sa aniamin a shkuda.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

iaku thuini pitu a tilhaz shaunasai lhup: mriqaz naak a apuki’ay mathuaw miku sa kahiwan a kakaanin, mathuaw iaku pazazai numa matingqaran.
Seeing my grandmother’s passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和高興。
